zone.line: Bright wandererfair coquette of Heaven, having changed
To whom alone it has been given
To change & be adored for ever......
Envy not this dim world, for never
But once within its shadow grew
She One fair as you but far more true left me at the silent time
When the moon had also ceased to climb
The azure domepath of Heaven's deep, steep
And like an albatross asleep
HoverBalanced on her wings of light
Hovered in the purple night___

line.del: And I who sat beside her put

zone.line: Ere she sought her ocean went to seek her nest
In the chamber of the west.___
She left me, and I staid sat alone
Thinking over every tone,
Which though now silent to the ear
The enchanted heart could hear

mod.del: Like music past phrases to which a

zone.line: Like notes which die when born, but still
Haunt the echoes of the hill:
And the feeling ever- o too much
The soft vibrations of her touch
Even As if her gentle hand even now
Lightly placed trembles on My brow
